name: The Homer Multitext project on github
tagline: Archival data and software for working with editions of Homeric manuscripts
body:
## Current


- [hmtarchive][3]: the project's central data archive
- [hmtdigital][4]:  digital services for working with the Homer Multitext project archive


## In progress

- hmt-vm:  a Vagrant virtual machine definition for editorial work on the Homer Multitext project
- hmt-mom: Mandatory On-going Maintenance, a build project for testing and validating editorial
work on the Homer Multitext project
- morpheus: a fork of the Alpheios modification of the Perseus morphological parser, extending
the morphological data set to cover all vocabulary in the Homer Multitext project archive

## Other links

- the [Homer Multitext project web site][2]
- we rely on [the CITE architecture][1]


[4]:  https://github.com/homermultitext/hmtdigital

[3]:  https://github.com/homermultitext/hmtarchive

[2]: http://www.homermultitext.org

[1]: http://cite-architecture.github.io/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
